com.artemis

Class ComponentMapper<A extends Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.ComponentMapper<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Component type to map.

    public abstract class ComponentMapper<A extends Component>
extends Object
    Provide high performance component access and mutation from within a System. This is the recommended way to mutate composition and access components. Component Mappers are as fast as Transmuters.
    See Also:
    for a list of alternate ways to alter composition and access components.

      The type of components this mapper handles.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public A get(Entity e)
                        throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Fast but unsafe retrieval of a component for this entity.

        No bounding checks, so this could throw an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, however in most scenarios you already know the entity possesses this component.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity that should possess the component
        Returns:
        the instance of the component
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

                                 throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

      • get

        public A get(Entity e,
    boolean forceNewInstance)
                        throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Fast but unsafe retrieval of a component for this entity.

        No bounding checks, so this could throw an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, however in most scenarios you already know the entity possesses this component.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity that should possess the component
        forceNewInstance - Returns a new instance of the component (only applies to PackedComponents)
        Returns:
        the instance of the component
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

      • get

        public abstract A get(int entityId,
    boolean forceNewInstance)
                                 throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Fast but unsafe retrieval of a component for this entity, by id.

        No bounding checks, so this could throw an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, however in most scenarios you already know the entity possesses this component.

        Parameters:
        entityId - the entity that should possess the component
        forceNewInstance - Returns a new instance of the component (only applies to PackedComponents)
        Returns:
        the instance of the component
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

      • getSafe

        public A getSafe(Entity e)
        Fast and safe retrieval of a component for this entity.

        If the entity does not have this component then null is returned.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity that should possess the component
        Returns:
        the instance of the component

        Returns:

      • getSafe

        public A getSafe(Entity e,
        boolean forceNewInstance)
        Fast and safe retrieval of a component for this entity.

        If the entity does not have this component then null is returned.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity that should possess the component
        forceNewInstance - If true, returns a new instance of the component (only applies to PackedComponents)
        Returns:
        the instance of the component

      • getSafe

        public abstract A getSafe(int entityId,
        boolean forceNewInstance)
        Fast and safe retrieval of a component for this entity, by id.

        If the entity does not have this component then null is returned.

        Parameters:
        entityId - the entity id that should possess the component
        forceNewInstance - If true, returns a new instance of the component (only applies to PackedComponents)
        Returns:
        the instance of the component

      • getSafe

        public A getSafe(int entityId,
        A fallback)
        Fast and safe retrieval of a component for this entity. If the entity does not have this component then fallback is returned.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Entity that should possess the component
        fallback - fallback component to return, or null to return null.
        Returns:
        the instance of the component

      • set

        public A set(int entityId,
    boolean value)
        Create or remove a component from an entity. Does nothing if already removed or created respectively.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Entity id to change.
        value - true to create component (if missing), false to remove (if exists).
        Returns:
        the instance of the component, or null if removed.

      • set

        public A set(Entity entity,
    boolean value)
        Create or remove a component from an entity. Does nothing if already removed or created respectively.
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to change.
        value - true to create component (if missing), false to remove (if exists).
        Returns:
        the instance of the component, or null if removed.

      • getFor

        public static <T extends Component> ComponentMapper<T> getFor(Class<T> type,
                                              World world)
        Returns a component mapper for this type of components.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of components
        Parameters:
        type - the class of components this mapper uses
        world - the world that this component mapper should use
        Returns:
        a new mapper
